ResearchProjectDef.description: learn the process of crushing stone to concrete.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steel Concrete Infusion
ResearchProjectDef.description: learn a new steel concrete infusion for stronger structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasteel Concrete Infusion

ResearchProjectDef.label: Enjoy!!!
ResearchProjectDef.description: All parts to this mod are the Reinforced Structures mod, and Tiered Concrete mod, use both to get the strongest posible buildings. Thanks for trying my mod and keep an eye out for new adations to this pack. Happy defending!
